name: Project Alice
description:
The world is coming to and end... and monsters of all sorts are coming from nowhere! Green explosive monsters invaded a school and destroyed Alice's robot. Now Alice needs to kill all those monsters and try to save the world, one bullet at time.

Project Alice is a game I started on RPG Maker VX but never finished it and now I'm porting it to RPG Maker MV, mostly unchanged.

This is also ny submission to  End Of The World Jam

Controls
  • Arrow keys - move the player
  • Enter - talks to people, moves objects
  • Esc - enters menu
  • A - shoots
  • Shift - runs
Download Instructions

Save the zip file, extract the folder and open Game.exe
